title: Researcher & Center Associate
description_1: Design survey and census outreach messaging experiments, and statistically analyze and present datasets using R and MongoDB to stakeholders
description_2: Independently query, analyze and model both structured and unstructured datasets to measure disparity and social impacts
description_3: Design and deployed interactive data visualization tools such as data dashboards and mapping tools using R, shiny, ArcGIS and AWS
column13: Design and deploy interactive data visualization tools such as data dashboards and mapping tools using R, shiny, ArcGIS and AWS

title: Researcher
description_1: Work with local, state, and national organizations on over 130 data consulting projects
description_2: Program Qualtrics experimental surveys with name-matching algorithms to determine ethnicity from voter files
description_3: Create the infographic reporting workflow for survey projects using R and Python

title: Summer Fellow (Survey Design)
description_1: Worked closely with coordinators, principals and teachers on program evaluations
description_2: Created stratified weighted sampling surveys to evaluate programs of Camino Nuevo charter school network
description_3: Designed protocols and methodology for future program evaluations

title: Data Analyst Intern
description_1: Interviewed thoracic oncologists in Japan and China for pharmaceutical clients, who are on phase II trials of non-small cell lung cancer drugs
description_2: Translated three-way phone meetings between client, SmartAnalyst and Chinese thoracic oncologists
description_3: Crowdsourced a list of thoracic oncologists through medical journals

title: [2020 Census and Beyond: Mapping the Geography and Diversity of AAPI](https://censusmaps.aapidata.com)
